channel.title: [PI] World 2 for Donators Only
channel.description:
Ok well I am trying to get a second world for my server and I think I have a Login server already I just need to know if it is Client side or Server side that I need to do regarding Staff or Donators only
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SrFIGqw.png[/img]
What can I do?
EDIT:
And yes everything all works. I can connect to World 2 if the ports are the same etc.

item.title: [PI] World 2 for Donators Only
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Do the checks server sided, otherwise the client can be manipulated.

Read full topic
